fields.description:
Description:
Starting animation and rotating device result in upper image stretching on each rotation. The upper image returns it's original size after animation finished (in about 2-3 seconds)

It is not a regression, occurs in 3.0.0.GA

Test steps:
1. KitchenSink> Base UI> Animation> 2D Transform
2. Click Animate and start rotating the device

Actual:
An upper image changes size and resizes back in 2-3 seconds after animation completed.
Expected:
Images should be the same size
fields.summary: iOS: Animation - Image changes size during continuous rotation

Tested with:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201301281948
Titanium SDK, build: 3.0.2.v20130129171611

iPad4 iOS 6.1
iPad2 iOS 5.1

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
